item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 24, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The tools I love are made by awful people (26 points | 19 comments)
2. Shortest-possible walking tour to 81,998 bars in South Korea (175 points | 39 comments)
3. Show HN: My from-scratch OS kernel that runs DOOM (118 points | 25 comments)
4. How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2 (982 points | 231 comments)
5. CubeCL: GPU Kernels in Rust for CUDA, ROCm, and WGPU (87 points | 9 comments)
6. You wouldn't steal a font (796 points | 260 comments)
7. Yagri: You are gonna read it (140 points | 74 comments)
8. Teaching LLMs how to solid model (212 points | 66 comments)
9. Launch HN: Cua (YC X25) – Open-Source Docker Container for Computer-Use Agents (121 points | 44 comments)
10. Apple and Meta fined millions for breaching EU law (380 points | 504 comments)
11. Graphics livecoding in Common Lisp (131 points | 32 comments)
12. AI Horseless Carriages (536 points | 348 comments)
13. Clinical trial: novel nutritional formula treats gut microbial overgrowth (26 points | 5 comments)
14. Google blocked Motorola use of Perplexity AI, witness says (138 points | 85 comments)
15. MCP on AWS Lambda with MCPEngine (70 points | 7 comments)
16. First Successful Lightning Triggering and Guiding Using a Drone (94 points | 38 comments)
17. I Tried to Buy an Actual Barrel of Crude Oil (2015) (21 points | 6 comments)
18. The Future of MCPs (124 points | 54 comments)
19. C++26: more constexpr in the core language (80 points | 47 comments)
20. Show HN: Node.js video tutorials where you can edit and run the code (191 points | 59 comments)
21. My experience of participating to a startup weekend competition in Italy (30 points | 5 comments)
22. DOGE worker’s code supports NLRB whistleblower (748 points | 400 comments)
23. Sail-Trim Simulator (97 points | 21 comments)
24. Yaakov Kirschen’s other legacy (18 points | 3 comments)
25. Lucene University (45 points | 1 comment)
26. Spring 83: a draft protocol intended to suggest new ways of relating online (67 points | 14 comments)
27. Sustain your creative drive in the face of technological change (84 points | 7 comments)
28. Beer on Board in the Age of Sail (2017) (46 points | 33 comments)
29. Ninth Circuit Takes a Wrecking Ball to Internet Personal Jurisdiction Law (80 points | 45 comments)
30. More Everything Forever (110 points | 173 comments)
